SELECT t.id ,t.project_name AS `name` ,t.create_time AS publishTime ,t.construction_requirement AS requirement ,t.cooperation_method as method ,t.company_name as company ,t.project_investment_content as investmentContent ,t.area_name as area ,t.project_phone as phone ,t.construction_condition ,t.industrial_condition ,t.market_outlook_forecast ,JSON_OBJECT("investmentTotal",t.investment_total,"fundingAmount",t.funding_amount, "privateCapital",t.private_capital, "paybackPeriod",t.payback_period) as target ,(SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG( lb.`name`) FROM tb_project_label lb WHERE lb.id IN (SELECT rel.label_id FROM tb_project_label_relation rel WHERE rel.project_id = t.id)) as labels ,res.resource_url as video ,res.index_url as picture FROM tb_project_info t LEFT JOIN tb_project_resource res ON res.id = (SELECT t1.id FROM tb_project_resource t1 WHERE t1.project_id = t.id AND t1.resource_type = 1 AND t1.deleted = 0 LIMIT 0,1)
t.deleted = 0
and t.id = #{param.id}
and t.id in (SELECT rel.project_id from tb_project_label_relation rel WHERE rel.label_id in (SELECT lb.id from tb_project_label lb WHERE lb.`name` = #{param.label}))
and (t.project_name Like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword},'%') Or t.company_name Like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword},'%'))
and t.area_name = #{param.area}
ORDER BY t.create_time desc
ORDER BY t.create_time asc
SELECT DISTINCT t.area_name FROM tb_project_info t WHERE t.area_name != '' AND t.deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.area_name desc
SELECT DISTINCT t.`name` FROM tb_project_label t WHERE t.deleted = 0 AND t.`status` = 1 ORDER BY t.`name` ASC
